hero.title: Your Free & Open Source Procedural Modeling Tool
hero.subtitle: Create your 3D models with node-based workflows, cross-platform projects, and even XR experiences!
hero.olderVersions: Looking for older versions or source code?

openSource.title: Proudly Open Source
openSource.desc: Cunning3D is open source and powered by open source software. The code is available on

modeling.title: Procedural Modeling
modeling.desc: Non-destructive, node-based geometry creation for infinite creative possibilities.

performance.title: High Performance
performance.desc: Blazing fast operations powered by Rust and GPU compute.

platform.title: Cross-Platform
platform.desc: Run everywhere: desktop, browser, game engines.

extensibility.title: Extensibility
extensibility.desc: Customize and extend with scripts and plugins.

ai.title: AI-Powered
ai.desc: Built-in AI assistance. Local-first, privacy-focused, 100% free.
ai.tip: No API keys required. All AI features work offline with local LLMs.

download.title: Download Cunning3D
download.subtitle: Get the latest version of Cunning3D for your platform. Free and open source.
download.noReleases: No releases available yet. Check back soon or build from source!
download.seeDoc: See the {link} for detailed build instructions.

showcase.title: Showcase
showcase.subtitle: Amazing creations made with Cunning3D. Get inspired by what the community is building.
showcase.noWorks: No works found for this filter.

cta.title: Want to be featured?
cta.desc: Share your Cunning3D creations and get featured in our showcase!

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: See what we're building and what's coming next. This roadmap is updated regularly based on community feedback.

cta.title: Have a feature request?
cta.desc: Join our community and help shape the future of Cunning3D.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Version history and release notes. Automatically synced from GitHub Releases.
changelog.noReleasesDesc: Check back soon or follow us on GitHub for updates.

cta.title: Stay updated
cta.desc: Watch the GitHub repository or join Discord to get notified about new releases.

donate.title: Support the future of Cunning3D
donate.subtitle: Join the Development Fund and support Cunning3D to work on core procedural modeling development.

mePage.name: Your Name
mePage.title: Your Title / Role
mePage.aboutContent: Write your personal introduction here. Share who you are, what you do, and what makes you unique. This is your chance to tell your story and connect with your visitors.
mePage.backgroundContent: Share your professional background, education, or any relevant experiences that shaped who you are today. This could include your career journey, significant achievements, or pivotal moments.
mePage.interestsContent: What do you enjoy doing in your free time? Share your hobbies, passions, or any side projects you're working on. This helps visitors get a fuller picture of who you are beyond your professional life.
